cont.entity_a: Leaves metal slivers around the edges of cans.
Requires multiple attempts to open a can, making it inefficient and frustrating to use. Difficult to use on the first attempt, often requiring several tries.
cont.entity_b: Fails to latch onto cans properly, often slipping off. Struggles to puncture lids, requiring excessive force. Often leaves cans partially opened.

cont.entity_a: Malfunctioning within a year of purchase.
Does not fit well in a drawer.
cont.entity_b: Difficult to store. Not intuitive, making it difficult to use without instructions.

cont.entity_a: Struggles with opening cans, especially those with glued lids, leading to spills. Not suitable for opening rectangular-shaped cans. Cutting mechanism becomes dull quickly, reducing effectiveness.
cont.entity_b: Magnet feature for lid removal is weak and ineffective. Lock mechanism is flimsy and prone to breaking. Not recommended for individuals with limited hand strength.

cont.entity_a: Difficult to turn, causing strain on the wrist.
High compared to other effective can openers.
